column4: hi. After upgrading to 11.4 I get: error out of disk on hd0. Press any key.     Why is that? After I press enter it boots up normal.

one change from 10.10 to 11.04 was in the grub.conf to change `set root(hd0,msdos1)` to `set root(sda,msdos1)` it could be your grub.conf didn't get updated, but your mbr did and grub is warning about the syntax change
no. Only sda's in the config file.
